mapper.select: select S.RNUM, S.BOARDSEQ AS BOARDSEQ, S.BOARDKIND AS BOARDKIND, S.TITLE AS TITLE, S.CONTENT AS CONTENT, S.NOTICEYN AS NOTICEYN, S.STATUS AS STATUS, S.INDATE AS INDATE, S.INUSERID AS INUSERID, S.MODDATE AS "UPDATE", S.UPUSERID AS UPUSERID, S.FILESEQ AS FILESEQ, S.SUBSEQ AS SUBSEQ FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , T.* FROM( SELECT BOARD_SEQ AS BOARDSEQ, BOARD_KIND AS BOARDKIND, TITLE AS TITLE, CONTENT AS CONTENT, NOTICE_YN AS NOTICEYN, STATUS AS STATUS, IN_DATE AS INDATE, IN_USER_ID AS INUSERID, UP_DATE AS MODDATE, UP_USER_ID AS UPUSERID, FILE_SEQ AS FILESEQ, SUB_SEQ AS SUBSEQ FROM BROWNIE_BOARD WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY BOARD_SEQ DESC )T )S WHERE S.RNUM BETWEEN TO_NUMBER(#{pageNum})*10-9 AND TO_NUMBER(#{pageNum})*10
